QuestData.Title: Blubbergut
QuestData.Description: Ahoy, mon!$b$bYou think you be able ta do something for da village here?$b$bMost whales we can handle fine, but there be a special whale out there that be too big for our spears.$b$bBlubbergut been gettin' bigger an' bigger - eatin' up the fish we use to live on!$b$bGet out there and find the thing, then make him pay for his gluttony!
QuestData.LogDescription: Mai'Lahii wants you to kill Blubbergut.
QuestData.RewardText: Oy, mon! Ya did it!$b$bWe soon be havin' fish to eat, thanks be to you.
